                                            <div class="arrow">

                                        </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-info">
                            我已阅读并同意<span><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/user/20220119.html" target="_blank">《用户协议》</a><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/privacy/20220715.html" target="_blank">《“什么值得买”个人信息保护政策》》</a></span>       
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mobile-submit">确定</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div> -->
    <!-- comment_wrap end -->
